grep examples

These examples show how grep should work on the birds and fish lists provided with the starter code.

In []:
grep('birds.txt', 'er', 'birds.txt.er')


File
birds.txt.er


tern
tanager


In []:
grep('fish.txt', 'er', 'fish.txt.er')


File
fish.txt.er


mackerel
angler fish
lantern fish


In []:
grep('dir/mammals.txt', 'er', 'dir/mammals.txt.er')


File
dir/mammals.txt.er


panther
